WHY INDIA IS .....INCREDIBLE INDIA?

>>>INCREDIBLE INDIA:

INCREDIBLE INDIA.....JUST INCREDIBLE....Since the inception of life on the earth from India......inception of civilization from India.WE HAVE 'SANATAN"( That has no inception time!!!! No body knows) RELIGION
We have most precious assets in the world for all the time...The GEETA...THE VEDAS....THE RAMAYANA.....THE MAHABHARATA ....THE KAMASUTRAS....THE KHAJURAHO AND  MOST ADMIRABLE THE MOTHER HOLY GANGES...WHERE THE CIVILISATION TOOK PLACE...... AND ONE DAY OUR ASHES HAVE TO BE MIXED IN THE HOLY GANGES..FOR EVER
